hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
docker $podman_remote_flag stop hpds && docker $podman_remote_flag rm hpds
docker $podman_remote_flag stop httpd && docker $podman_remote_flag rm httpd
docker $podman_remote_flag stop wildfly && docker $podman_remote_flag rm wildfly
sed '/wildfly/d' /etc/hosts > hosts.new && cat hosts.new > /etc/hosts sed '/httpd/d' /etc/hosts > hosts.new && cat hosts.new > /etc/hosts sed '/hpds/d' /etc/hosts > hosts.new && cat hosts.new > /etc/hosts
